title: Integrated Engineering Technology and Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental engineering principles and secondary-level mathematics knowledge
context.additional_context: A course enhancing mathematical thinking and engineering technology application skills through integrated learning based on real-world work cases. Supports supplemental learning via mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply necessary mathematical concepts to solve real engineering problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain mathematical principles used in image processing technology by connecting them to practical case studies.
Learners achieve over 90% of weekly learning goals using mobile learning tools.
Learners score an average of 75 points or higher on technology-mathematics integrated problems in formative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
